meanings.definition: The position or rank of a captain.
meanings.sent1: Her captainship on the ship made her responsible for the crew.
meanings.sent2: The captainship of the team inspired everyone to work together.
meanings.sent3: In the game of pretend pirates, her captainship led the way to hidden treasures.
meanings.sent4: His captainship in the debate club guided the team to victory.
meanings.sent5: The captainship of the space mission required courage and quick thinking.

meanings.definition: The authority or leadership of a captain.
meanings.sent1: The captainship of the army ensured discipline and order.
meanings.sent2: Under his captainship, the company flourished and grew.
meanings.sent3: With her captainship, the school play was a huge success.
meanings.sent4: His captainship in the courtroom demanded respect and attention.
meanings.sent5: The captainship of the expedition kept everyone safe and on track.
